#summary How to use table_floating_header.js.
#labels Featured,Phase-Implementation

= Introduction =

This script makes it REALLY easy to keep table header rows on the screen while the user scrolls up and down the page

= Details =

3 Steps:
 # Download table_floating_header.js and put it in your HTML directory.  Make sure you give the web server user access to view the js
 # Add this line anywhere in your HTML:  *<script type="text/javascript" src="table_floating_header.js"></script>*
 # Put *{{{<thead></thead>}}}* around the rows you want to keep on the page

That's it!

Example HTML page:
{{{
<html>
<head>
<script type="text/javascript" src="/js/table_floating_header.js"></script>
</head>
<body>
<table>
<thead>
<tr><th>Customer Contact Information</th></tr>
<tr><th>Name</th><th>Address</th><th>Daytime Phone</th><th>Evening Phone</th><th>Cell Phone</th><th>Work Phone</th></tr>
</thead>
<tr><td>customer 1.....</td></tr>
.
.
lots more rows here
.
.
.
</table>
</body>
</html>
}}}
